content: {"name": "Ethos Jamaica Plain at Out4Supper", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For more information or to register to attend a Community Cafe near you, please call 617-477-6688 or email ethosmeals@ethocare.org", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ethocare.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "301 South Huntington Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Jamaica Plain", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02130", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3247516, "longitude": -71.1127774}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 522-6700", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "22:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call or email for registration"}]}
